thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com
thread.title: M.E. Murphy

author: M.E. Murphy
title: M.E. Murphy
text: I had no experience working with an online printer before working with Moo, nor had I any experience making an IPhone photo into a postcard. When the first batch didn't turn out due to our errors they were willing to help me correct my errors using easy to understand language. Then they paid for my revised order and new shipping costs. I have since received technical support with a second order and again they were extremely helpful making sure my order would be high quality and to my satisfaction. I highly recommend them.
